mapper.sql: id, store_id, date, inspector, recycle_area_img, scrap_area_img, handle_area_img, create_time, update_time
mapper.update:
UPDATE recycle_area_inspection
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date = #{date,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inspector = #{inspector,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recycle_area_img = #{recycleAreaImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scrap_area_img = #{scrapAreaImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handle_area_img = #{handleAreaImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
